channel.title: This is embaressing <--- dang i spelt that wrong too
channel.description: well i have been reading my java books for about 2 hours now and in that book it dose not tell you what to compile the fucker with.... what i use? and when i try useing the command thing it says unreconized command blah blah blah so what do i use? im guessing a batch file but what i put in it? lil help?

item.title: This is embaressing <--- dang i spelt that wrong too
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You can set your classpath variable and use the simple batch command

javac *.java

Or you can be lazy and put javac.exe into your C:\Windows\System32\ folder and still use the batch command

javac *.java

Read full topic
